website_summaries.verdict: A value-priced set, but if you need spoons, choose another option.
pros: A basic yet durable set that comes on the lower end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: It started a week after purchase and has gotten worse and worse
customer_reviews.text: The 1 cup measuring cup has started to rust!!! It started a week after purchase and has gotten worse and worse!! Do not buy! They also do not have a return policy's
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great finish, great quality at discount price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of measuring cups based on price (not the cheapest) & what I perceived was a good value based on pics and previous reviews. However I was still skeptical. Until I received my measuring cups. I was impressed with the weight before I even opened the box. Cheaper low quality M-cups are made from thinner metal & softer metals and/or the handles are tack welded and eventually break. These are made from stainless steel, the handles are the cup come from one mold, and they even stack beautifully because of the small nipple in the front. I've used them and ran them through the wash. I'm very impressed and highly recommend these M-Cups.
customer_reviews.author: Shane H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice...just can tend to dig into the hand due to thin, short handles.
customer_reviews.text: All around pretty great little cups. Sturdy, solid and they look nice. The only reason I can't give full stars is because the edges of the handles tend to dig into the hand if you try to use them for scooping something that's somewhat solid (cold coconut oil from sitting in the cupboard not the fridge). But they're still nice, WAY better than the Walmart plastic ones!!!! I guess they better be...they're WAY more expensive. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: After trying and discarding several sets of measuring cups, these fit all my needs/wants. They nest and actually fit into a standard height drawer. The handles have a very good feel - the little thumb depression on the top with the corresponding bump underneath gives you a good sturdy grip. And since the cups and handles are all one piece, no rivets to worry about (to come loose or collect icky stuff). The top edges of the cups are just slightly curved out, making it easy to level your measurements. And those edges are smooth, no burrs, no little questionable places. These are the best measuring cups I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Davis

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality: Would not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible quality for the price. Two of the six cups I received had dips on the side of the lips. Meaning, measuring liquids would not be possible and if I try to level off anything else, it will fall out of one side. This is not a huge deal, but disappointing for quality that was advertised. The edges are roughly cut and look cheaply made. The lettering of the cup sizes is faded on three out of six, which is confounding for brand new products.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design: pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups are a nice design; good looking and they nest together nicely. I’m used to working with a set of only three measuring cups so the all extra sizes are a pleasant plus, especially since they take up no more space in my counter drawer than the old set. I’ll also note that the cups are very nice one-piece stamping. The reason I replaced my old set is that the spot welds holding the handle on one cup failed. Obviously that can’t happen with these. I expect to get many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: The Tin Man

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for ladles
customer_reviews.text: Hear me out. So you've just made a batch of chicken tortilla soup, but your only ladle is dirty. You could wash it, but your prefrontal cortex isn't fully formed yet so the idea doesn't occur to you. With one of these measuring cups, not only do you effectively transfer your dinner into a bowl, but now you've added portion control to the mix. That's my story and I'm sticking to it. I got these as a gift in 2015 and they are still working well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Simcha Katsnelson

customer_reviews.title: Solid set of measuring cups with handles that really need to be a touch longer.
customer_reviews.text: well constructed set of more cups then you’ll probably need, but they’ll be there should you. The set nests perfectly and take up practically no space. The handles are flush with the cup tops to make evening off contents a smooth an easy process. The depressed channel in the handle help stiffen an already sturdy design. I personally would like if the handles were an extra 1/2-3/4” longer, but not deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Millersdad

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an old (half missing) plastic set of measuring cups. I'm so glad I purchased these! I love that they're stainless, and I love how they nest together and the chain keeps them together so I don't have to search for the cup I need. Super easy to clean, but like with all stainless, you don't want to let these sit in the sink. For best results, wash after using and let dry. I've read other reviews saying that the measuring of these cups in inaccurate, but I have had no such problems. I've made multiple recipes from pound cakes, to homemade buttermilk pancakes with absolutely no problems. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: These stainless steel measuring cups appear to be made of high quality stainless steel and should last a lifetime if taken care of. Easy to clean and very sturdy. I like that the 3/4 cup size is also included. Most sets are only 5-piece and the 3/4 cup size must be purchased separately...if you can find it anywhere. The only improvement might be to make the measurement embossing a little larger for older or vision impaired persons. A thought could be to fill in the embossing with enamel paint or something to make the info stand out better from the stainless steel. Other than that these a a 5-star choice.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cups, shiny, well-made, stack nicely together w removable chain. The measurements are ingrained, not printed. Love that set comes in 6 sizes, not the usual, standard 4. Seller was excellent. I also ordered another set from a different brand which I returned due to poor quality but their cups have little spout for easy pouring. This set would be perfect 5 if it did. Yes, I'm particular cook/baker!
customer_reviews.author: Kalani

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, sturdy, easy to clean, sits upright in my drawer just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I like these measuring cups very much, because they have the 2/3 and 3/4 cup measures. They stack well due to the handle (which I didn't like at first because it isn't comfortable in my hand). After using them I realized that the handle design enables the stack of measuring cups to sit upright in my drawer. I turn my other sets of measuring cups upside down because the handles stick up. They are curved on the bottom, so a spatula or spoon can easily remove the contents of the cup. I like that I can clean them in the dishwasher. I like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cups.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing stainless steel measuring cups, after using plastic for years. I'm blown away by how much I like these. The numbers are very easy to see, and since they're pressed into the handle, they won't wear off like plastic cups. I really like the rounded bottom on the inside. It's much easier to clean and things like flower don't get trapped. They're very sturdy and well made. My wife and I are extremely satisfied with our purchase and have already recommended them to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Measuring Cups on Freakin' Steroids
customer_reviews.text: These are the manliest manly-man measuring cups I've ever rested my manly hands on. Flour and sugar doesn't stand a chance of not getting measured. Also, they appear to be indestructible as each cup is a single piece of metal with no connections to come apart or rust. I'm stinkin' excited about these.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Regular Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, but light and thin with too short handles
customer_reviews.text: The cups appear to be of a decent quality. Since I'm returning them I can't say how well they'll hold up over time. They are a little light and thin. I assume that's why the handles are so short. The interiors are not very polished, i.e., not very smooth. The biggest problem for me and why I returned them are the handles. They are simply too short and that makes the cup feel awkward in use. I bought a second set of AMCO Advanced Performance Measuring cups as a replacement for these.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I really like these measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: I really like these measuring cups. They have a 2/3 and 3/4th cup sized cups included with the sets. While it is easy to arrive at these measurements without those particular cups, they really do save time. They stack nicely and take up minimal space in the cupboard. These cups are also very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy SumnerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: The best measuring cups that I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: The measuring cups nest snugly and take up very little space in my kitchen drawer. They are easy to use and I love the stubby handles - nothing to break off and still enough to grip. The best part is that there are six sizes, so no more guessing what is in between. I bake a lot and they are the very best - easy to use, easy to clean and easy to store. Quite a nice combination. I love them and I think that most every kitchen could definitely use a set.
customer_reviews.author: Goat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy handles
customer_reviews.text: Wanted new stainless steel measuring cups but most on Amazon seemed to suffer from bending issues in the handle. These do not have that issue. Handles are decently think and wide, making them strong and easy to handle (pun intended). Sizes are engraved/sketched into the metal and are easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT!  Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set and includes a 2/3 cup and a 3/4 cup measuring cup. They are very sturdy and have a lovely finish inside and out - shiny on the outside, brushed stainless on the inside. The handles are part of each cup itself, so there's no danger of bending off and they are good, solid stainless, so no bending at all. The bottoms are rounded at the edges, so a small spatula works great if you're measuring something that sticks. An excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Great Measuring Cups
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these measuring cups for myself in the past. I like them so much that I decided to purchase a set as a gift for my daughter to replace her terrible plastic ones. She will love them because they are sturdy, easy to clean and very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: These were a bit more expensive than I had hoped, but once I got them, I realized they were worth it! I had bought some other stainless measuring cups, but they were flimsy and the handles broke. These guys are STURDY! I also like that they have the "odd" sizes that many sets don't have. Only "down" side, and it's something I will get used to, is that the handles are kind of short. That's likely not an issue for folks, but other measuring cups I've had have slightly longer handles.
customer_reviews.author: susan l.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: These stylish and functional measuring cups will last a lifetime and you'll be happy you purchased them every time you prepare to cook or bake. The old adage, "you get what you pay for" definitely applies here. When you hold the set in your hands, you'll appreciate the solid heft they possess. The handles are sturdy and comfortable, and the measurements are clear and easy to read. With some basic steps to care for these cups, such as hand washing them and avoiding stovetop use, you'll likely never need to purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: MMiller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use, and comes with all of the sizes you need!
customer_reviews.text: I love these measuring cups! I had a set of stainless steel cups that I had been using and loved them until several of the handles fell off. These cups are one piece, so there are no handles to fall off. They are so easy to use, and they nestle nicely for storage. Even though this set has more cups (including 2/3 and 3/4 cup) they take up less room in my drawer than my previous set. I have absolutely no complaints and would definitely recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: texas_girl

customer_reviews.title: 2/3 and 3/4 cup. My search is over!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Having a 2/3 and 3/4 cup comes in handy more times than you think. We only hand wash these but are careful not to let them soak too long. The cups could be a potential hazard to children and even careless adults as they are kinda sharp. But attentive adults should be fine using them.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my roommate and I were splitting up. The measuring cups that he is taking with him were the cheap kind. I work full-time and like to come home to a nice home. I don't really want to use those plastic or cheap metal measuring cups if I can help it. These seemed to be the highest reviewed measuring cups on Amazon. I bit the bullet and purchased them. No regrets. I use these things almost everyday. They come in handy with meal prepping and look good in photos that I take for a meal prepping blog. Very happy with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Stacks on stacks on stacks. Organize that drawer!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever frustratingly fumbled around with a plastic ring, desperately trying to find the right size measuring cup? Do you ever get annoyed when the measuring cups clump together in the dishwasher and fail to get clean? Do you like things that stack? How about stainless steal, do you like it? If you ever answered yes to any of the above, these measuring cups are for you. I've been using this product for a few months, and I'm very happy. They've stood up to many clumsy drops from high-up and steamy dishwasher cycles. The stainless steel cups are well made, accurate, and very attractive.. I'm really failing to think of a con to all these pros..
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Bomb-Proof, Grown-Up Tools for Serious Kitchen Dwellers
customer_reviews.text: These things are bomb-proof. Future archaeologists will uncover them from beneath the rubble of a long-past Vesuvian eruption, and marvel at their pristine condition. They will gawk at their full metal thickness, obvious physical solidity, and inordinate atomic mass. If a war is presently occurring, they may give genuine contemplation to melting these shiny beauties down in order to resupply the entire effort's materiel needs. But seriously, I recommend taking the chain off that joins them all together. These are the very best measuring cups I have ever owned. They put all others, especially that plastic set you grew up with, to fully embarrassed shame.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for measuring cups like these for a long time. My sister and I are both big time bakers and we are always looking for new measuring cups because the other brands (especially plastic) just don't work as well when you are baking large 4+ tier wedding cakes. These have been great for any ingredients because they don't bend out of shape or snap/break. They are very heavy duty, durable, and easy to wash. I highly recommend them for any and all of your baking needs!
customer_reviews.author: Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and looks like it will last for years
customer_reviews.text: These are very rugged, solid and feel durable. The markings are also stamped and not printed, so there is no possible way that they can wear out. I especially like that each cup is made from 1 piece so there are no joints that can fall apart. Also, the price is VERY fair for what is clearly a high-quality item. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: MikeNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: My first reason for choosing this set over others was that it had 6 measuring cups over 4 or 5. I've had a few sets here and there but had one that had 6, that box was lost in a recent move. The set with 4 cups made it here. I missed having the 1/3 and 2/3 measuring cups and guessing. The quality, look and feel of these are the best. Would make a great gift for anyone. I am quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: What a Beautiful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been baking for over 40 years and needed to replace my measuring cups. I kept putting it off thinking I'd never find anything as good. After careful research I chose these and am so glad that I did. In fact, now I wish that I had replaced the old ones sooner. These are heavy duty, measure with precision, are easy to clean, stack nicely and take up less space. What a beautiful product!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Beech

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: These look nice and they measure just fine. The only thing I don't like about them is that the handles are so flat that the edges are sharp and uncomfortable to hold. Not a biggie, but if I had picked them up at the store, I wouldn't have bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Measuring Cups
customer_reviews.text: There are good points and negative points. What I love is the sturdiness, these will never bend. I love the fact they are very shiny stainless steal. The negative aspects are, the handles are too short and kind of sharp. The measurement markings are hard to see..I may send these back.
customer_reviews.author: j robertson

customer_reviews.title: The Best Measuring Cups I Have Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: Love these measuring cups! They are made very well. I like how they stack so neatly in my cupboard. They have a rounded bottom which makes for easy cleaning. I highly recommend them if you are someone that cooks and bakes a lot. You will love how they feel and how easy they are to clean, work with and store.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: My best ever measuring cups!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these measuring cup for my husband. He is cooking wonderful meals — in self defense! (I’m not a cook. Tonight I made a box of rice with a flavor packet. That’s my speed!). Roy made Chicken Picotta for the first time this week and it was delicious!!! The measuring cups are very well made, nesting, and clearly marked for volume. We especially like that the handle is an extension of the cup rather than a separate attached piece, preventing it from snapping off with repeated use!
customer_reviews.author: Maie

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight to these, easily stackable with handles that are not a separate piece attached, but rather molded into the cups themselves. I did a lot of searching and these are at least half the price of other sets with fancy names. And you get 6 different measurements, unlike most sets of 4. You will love them!
customer_reviews.author: ChellyA

customer_reviews.title: it's nice to have a set that will outlast me
customer_reviews.text: I swear by these and will keep these until the day I die. They have everything I was looking for in a measuring cup. After spending much more on many plastic ones over the years, it's nice to have a set that will outlast me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Measuring Cups
customer_reviews.text: These are the best measuring cups and probably the last ones that I will ever own. They are sturdy, easy to clean and the engraved markings are permanent and very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: These are great measuring cups - high quality but not too heavy; they sit firmly on the counter; and there are two more measuring cups than you usually find (2/3 cup and 3/4 cup). But be aware that these are measuring cups for dry ingredients - no pouring spouts on them. I was looking specifically for dry ingredient measuring, and these were even better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine W. Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I love that this set includes a 3/4 c measurement. The one piece construction is great; they are strong and there is no lip that catches ingredients or inhibits leveling. The short handles are easy to hold and get into containers easily. They are a breeze to clean and they look and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: sarahdoc

customer_reviews.title: Safer Than Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the process of replacing all of my kitchenware from potentially harmful plastic to wood, glass and metal. The price of these measuring cups was more than I wanted to pay, but they appear well-constructed and give me the impression that they are durable. A recommendable product, especially if you're unsure the plastic cups that you've been using might contain BPA or BPS. One star has been deducted from my rating because they were manufactured in China instead of the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these measuring cups! They are sturdy and well made and, odd as it sounds, pleasurable to use! For those of us who grew up with our mothers using metal cups, it's somewhat nostalgic, and a great change from plastic cups. But, I think they would also be very stylish in a modern kitchen. I paid $20 for a 4 piece metal set at a local store. I really wanted a 3/4 cup, but couldn't find any that weren't made of plastic. I saw these and thought I'd give them a try. I would definitely buy them again! These would make a great gift for a bridal shower or a housewarming party!
customer_reviews.author: LH momto4

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality Measuring Cups
customer_reviews.text: Craftsmanship is the best quality of the measuring cups. Yes, I can purchase measuring cups for less, but the quality is superior. My previous stainless steel set was a welded variety and the weld broke because of pressure put on the handles when dipping into and out of the flour bin/bowls used for cooking. These cups stack nicely and since they are one-piece the handle will never break. Spend the extra money and you will never have to purchase new ones again, plus they are made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift EVER - a set of measuring cups?  Yes!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for the family's talented, brilliant All-Things-Chocolate Master! These were a hit from the moment they slipped from the box... she balanced one in her hand... smiled. Another...smile grew. Then she examined and found the solid weight-balance and engraved sizes much to her liking... Only then did she realize the cup in her hand had "2/3" etched on the handle, then a quick peek and a squeak..."3/4" cup. Yes! This gift was AMAZING!! There will be more of these purchased for other specialists in the family...
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Best measuring cups I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous measuring cups! The handle/cup balance is better than any I've used. They are also non-marking on a white counter top (my counter top marks with everything so this was a major plus for me!) As noted in other reviews, there are no seams to get dirty, the edges are smooth and the cups are very comfortable to use for any size hands. I will buy these again for wedding gifts, house warming gifts. I've had many measuring cup sets, some have been fine, some have been lousy regardless of price, nothing I've ever owned or used is as good as these cups are. They are sure to please any cook.
customer_reviews.author: T Ferrin

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I was searching for!
customer_reviews.text: As a baker and cook for over 50 years, I was just plain tired of the rubbery plastic cups I’d had for a few decades. My kids had bought them as a gift for me, but now that they’re grown I wanted a set that would last a lifetime. These are EXCEPTIONAL! Their weight, nesting ability, ease of cleaning and extra sizes are WONDERFUL! I have not found them to be sharp as some have claimed- not at all! They’re just an honest set at a great price- and I’m very happy they are made in America to boot! Can’t recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: Mamasan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups have a short handle. I find them the perfect size for dipping in canisters for flour, sugar, etc. They have an interesting assortment of sizes. I use the 2/3 and the 3/4 more than I thought I would. They nest perfectly in the drawer and they are fabricated in one piece, so nothing accumulates between the handle and the cup, easy to clean. They also have metric measurement on each cup.
customer_reviews.author: Michele G. Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that these cups all nestle together yet can sit in a drawer. The handles on my old set couldn't do that. I like these without weld spots that break. Just a very nice set and worth the few extra dollars over the other sets. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: loves2read

customer_reviews.title: Poor Chinese made measuring cups.
customer_reviews.text: Made in China not the USA. I saw these on a mft website (1.99 cost). The stainless steel fades and I'm wondering if the steel "bleeds" into liquids. It's so hard to get good quality measuring cups. For all the good reviews. I can find these exact Chinese made produces for 4.99 at the local store. And I mean, they are exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Platinum

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Very good quality, simple design, and I hope they last me a lifetime. They stack together tightly, taking up very little space, and fit in one of my small kitchen drawers. I ordered these to replace a stainless steel measuring cup set, because the handles were falling off. My old set were very good quality stainless steel, but the handles were cheaply welded on. This set will not have that issue because each cub is one solid piece. These are a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Finally, all sizes in one set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of measuring cups because I had several partial sets in my drawer and it was making me crazy. This set had 1/3cup, 2/3 cup and 3/4 cup in addition to the normal sizes. I now have one complete set in my drawer! These are well manufactured and are dishwasher safe. I like the length of the handles also so that my hands don't have to get in the sugar or flour as I measure. I highly recommend this set to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Throw out the other sets!
customer_reviews.text: Great set with extra sizes that nest very well together with slightly rounded bottoms that make cleaning them very easy. The handles extend slightly as the sizes increase, making them easy to separate the cups quickly. Larger size printing would help aging eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of measuring cups that would last! I’m very happy with the product. I was very pleasantly surprised with how heavy the cups are. It’s so nice to Purchase an item and have it exceed your expectations. The handles are easy to hold onto. Each cup is well weighted. I like the addition of the extra measuring options of the extra cups. I’d highly recommend these if you are looking for a set of measuring cups which will last you for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and handy
customer_reviews.text: I love the heaviness of these...that I can't knock them over easily in my tiny kitchen. I love the extra sizes (2/3 and 3/4) that really make my life easier. And they nest beautifully and still fit inside my kitchen drawer. So far a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: They look very smart and professional
customer_reviews.text: I like the low profile of the measuring cups when they are stacked together. They fit perfectly in the drawer and take up little space. Because the measurements are imprinted into the cup they will never wear off. I removed all of my old plastic ones and only use these.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: The last set of measuring cups got old and the handles started to fall off because of the handles being added on to the cups. These cups have the cup and handle as one unit. Nice heavy gauge steel {stainless steel}. No sharp angles inside the cups. Very nice! We really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Love the short handles
customer_reviews.text: What a great set of measuring cups! I finally upgraded from plastic ones and find these are more accurate measuring tools. I love how they nest together. I was hesitant about the shorter handles, but find they are so easier to grab and use. Handles are not a problem. They wash up great and are wonderful all the way around. I'm ordering another set so I have two on busy baking days.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard50

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: It was time for an upgrade since I’ve been without a 1 cup measuring cup for a long time. I really like these. My previous measuring cups were collapsible silicone (I don’t use them) and the other set I regularly used were plastic and quite long/shallow with only 4 cups total.
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: ... these for over a year now and I do like the selection of sizes
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for over a year now and I do like the selection of sizes, whereas my prior set had only 4. These are very easy to clean and store. Compared with my prior set, though, the handles are short and uncomfortable to hold, in my opinion. (My prior set has rubber coatings on the handles, and I guess I got used to them.) Also, as others have mentioned, graduated markings on the interior of the cups would be a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Yogi

customer_reviews.title: "They are perfect", so says my grand daughter.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these measuring cups for my grand daughter, Shannon's, birthday. She had worn her old ones out due to the amazing amount of cooking, baking etc. that she does. Amazon sent them directly to her home and I have never laid eyes on the cups, but Shannon is thrilled with them. She says they are the best she has ever used and perfect for her needs. Shannon is an excellent cook and has been sharing her cooking talents since she was a child, therefore I trust she knows what she is talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of measuring cups!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect! I needed a full set of compact but good quality measuring cups and I couldn’t be more pleased. They nest perfectly and are small enough to fit into containers as a scooper. They came very nicely packaged and fairly quickly. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela H Allala

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few months now and they are doing great. Bought them because the numbers on our old ...
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a few months now and they are doing great. Bought them because the numbers on our old T-Fal cups were coming off way too easily (2 sets in less than a year, not even being put in a dishwasher). I went with these because the measurements are etched in. They work well, are accurate, and clean easily. Along with what a few other people have said, the edges are quite sharp. I won't dock a point off of that, but it could be a bigger issue for some.
customer_reviews.author: William Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set a few months back. I like to use a item for a while before reviewing it. Pros: Great price. Great product. These cups are solid and do not flex at all. Good quality finish. Easy to fill, easy to empty; the tapered bottom really helps. They nest and the extra sizes are useful (even though I though they were silly when I began). I would recommend these cups to anyone and for any kitchen. Cons: I didn't have these a long time ago. No, really. For this price you cannot go wrong. I have seen single cups that cost more than this set and were not as well built.
customer_reviews.author: AK-AK

customer_reviews.title: highest quality of measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: Great set of measuring cups, very sturdy, comfortable to use, easy to clean. Love that the markings are etched, love the short strong handles for scooping brown sugar and the like. Never heard of this name in kitchen accessories before, but very glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, perfect for baking and cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted stainless steel measuring cups for a while as I cook and bake on a daily basis. This set is heavy, well-made, balanced and has a flat bottom that will not tip. The markings are etched and won't fade over time. I wish the handles were a bit longer; my old plastic cups had a longer handle so I'm sure it's just a matter of getting used to it. There's a tiny grip opposite the handle which is good for balance and 'eyeballing'. These measuring cups will last a lifetime!!
customer_reviews.author: laurabun136

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Sturdy and really easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy and trust the Bellemain product line. Every product I have purchased from a citrus press, measuring spoons, measuring cups to a cast iron bacon press have all held up and worked as they were intended. Not sure if these products are made in the USA... but they scream of USA quality!!! I am not associated with Bellemain, nor do I get paid from them. I am simply appreciative of the quality products they offer. Joe
customer_reviews.author: Joe at here

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Measuring Cup Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set primarily to have the two sizes (3/4 cup and 2/3 cup) not included in the other measuring cup sets I have. After using these cups I'm certain they'll be my primary set for all measuring needs. They're sturdy, easy to use and easy to clean. As others have said, the handles are somewhat short, but I don't have any trouble using the cups. My set has no sharp edges and I believe they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight set! No bending handles with these!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great measuring set! Was looking for something heavy and sturdy. The way they are constructed you can scrape a knife easily across the top of the cups. Was tired of the plastic ones that break easily and these stand up to anything, even brown sugar. Easy to clean and stack neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend this product to anyone. I've had many measuring cup sets over the years and none compare to this for utility, sturdiness, and storage ease. They are simple to clean as well. Give them as a gift to anyone who bakes or is setting up a new home or apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what my mom needed. Her old plastic ones were used so much the numbers wore off! These are sturdy and high quality metal, and can take a beating (grandkids like playing the drums...) would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Nice measuring cups, but the handles are too short and stubby to hold comfortably
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups look very nice, seem well built, and provide a nice range of sizes of measuring cups. What I don't like about them are the handles. I have reasonably large hands, and it isn't very comfortable to hold the measuring cups by their handles as they are a bit too short and stubby to hold comfortably as the handles end up jabbing into my palm.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adamack

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised! Nice measuring cups!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured in a nice sturdy box which would have made a good gift-if it weren't for myself. The metal is not so thick as to make them cumbersome, but thick enough that it shouldn't dent easily. They stack nicely for storage. I'm excited to have a 3/4 and a 2/3 measure- making cookies will be so much easier! My only wish would be that they would have slightly longer handles to make scooping inside of deep bags of sugar or bins easier, but that is not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jane

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely surprised to get these and see that they are made from heavy duty stainless steel. I've been looking for months for a sturdy set with a wide hole to fit into my dishwasher. These are THE BEST!!! I guarantee you'll love them. The cup and handle are one piece not two...which if you're a big baker like me a two-piece measure cup can easily bend. Easy to read measurements!!! Since I do a lot of baking I'm thinking about purchasing another set. YOU'LL LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha K.

customer_reviews.title: measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: I really like the measuring cups, I love having the extra measuring one 2/3 cup. My only complaint which isn't much of one is I wish they were a bit easier to read and that they had longer handles. But they do work great.
customer_reviews.author: rjp

customer_reviews.title: Heavy quality
customer_reviews.text: I really love these. I have a plastic set I got from the grocery. I decided to treat myself to a nicer set which are these. It's nice when I'm baking to have 2 because when one's dusty from flour or caked with oil, I can use the other set. This set is very heavy, feels professional. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy K.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect nest of durable measures
customer_reviews.text: One piece, so the handles will never come off. This is a lifetime set. The presence of the extra two (2/3 and 3/4 cup) is a surprising plus ... who knew I'd need a 2/3 cup measure?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Potts

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to use and store
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a couple of weeks and so far, I love them. My previous set were hard, black plastic and the spoon size labels had worn off. I'm not a prof. cook; it wasn't always easy to be sure I was using the correct-sized spoon. These stainless steel spoons look permanently stamped and clearly marked, plus the magnetized handles conveniently keep the set together for storage, and the bonus is each spoon has 2 shapes--round on one end and oblong on the other.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these nest together- they take up very little room and stay nice and neat. They are a pleasure to use after using my clunky plastic ones for years. I like the extra sizes too. The stainless steel is good quality and I expect they will be in my kitchen a long time
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the measuring options. Not just the standard sizes. The cups nest together without the handles sticking up-this is a space saver and they fit into my drawer. Easy to read. Already bought a set for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: rennie

customer_reviews.title: wonderful set of cups!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very pleased with this set of measuring cups. I loved the 2/3 and the 3/4 cups. They're are very sturdy and look great. My only complaint is that the handles are very short. I wish they were just a couple of inches longer.
customer_reviews.author: parkyoojin

customer_reviews.title: Small things count
customer_reviews.text: I used to be happy with plastic cups rolling around the drawer, but then the measurements wore off and I found these wonderful items for very little money given what high quality stainless they are. US and metric measures are handy additions.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and small footprint
customer_reviews.text: The measuring cups are nice looking, easy to clean, and stack compactly. That said, the handles are a little short, which makes them easier to store, I suppose. I would not put a lot of force on them; they haven't bent on me, but don't seem to be industrial strength. I'm sure they're fine for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Nomads

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups are perfect,, they are made of a heavy metal that stands up on its own - I just lovethat there is a 3/4 and a 2/3 cup included We use those two sizes all the time and have to use another step or different cups. Thanks for making these measuring cups perfect. They even stack together for easy storage almost like they are magnetic,which they aren’t. Love them. These aren’t your cheap everyday measuring cups. I love mine and bought two sets. You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: A. Morlang

customer_reviews.title: sturdy stainless measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: full disclosure - these are a fairly new item in my house, but they seem to be EXACTLY what I was looking for. Friends have celiac disease, and I was looking for a reasonably priced set of study metal measuring cups to be part of my "gluten free" baking and cooking gear. They arrived promptly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Diane G.

customer_reviews.title: Stack perfectly to take up minimal room, easy to read #s
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what I was looking for! Many sizes, easy to read measurements, and they stack completely so they don’t take up much room In the cabinet at all. Easy to clean and good quality. I expect these to last a long time and wish I would have ordered them years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Multi-tasking Genius

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a set of cheap plastic measuring cups for decades. I decided I needed to upgrade. I am happy with the quality of these measuring cups. Nicely weighted and easy to care for.
customer_reviews.author: Marichan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price for an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love it when what is presented online (by picture and by product description) is actually not only what you receive, but is obtained for an excellent prices, arrives on-time and is also an excellent product for everyday usage. It is exactly as is advertised. I've no hesitancy in recommending your company. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Well made measuring cups with etched size information on handle -- Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cups for their sturdiness and the fact that they had the size information etched on the handle. My former measuring cups' size information was printed with ink on the handles. The ink completely wore off in a short amount of time. These will never wear out and are worth paying a little bit more money for the longevity of use. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I love these measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: My gosh, I love these measuring cups. They stack together in a really satisfying way and take up like zero space. They have flat bottoms that are kind of thick, so they sit nicely on the counter and I don't have to worry about knocking them over. The inside is curved so you can use a spoon or rubber scraper to get every last bit out (not possible with the cups I had before with more square corners). They also look gorgeous and professional!
customer_reviews.author: ELL

customer_reviews.title: Complete set for your needs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, mainly because they come in the majority of sizes you need and don't have to but the "missing" size which occurs with most sets. Only negative is that the corners of the handles aren't as rounded as they can be, meaning that they feel sharp. Regardless of that one negative these are the best set I have seen and are super easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Love these measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: Love these measuring cups. They're solid, and it seems that the handles are pretty darn sturdy. I've only had plastic measuring cups and eventually one of the handles would break off one of the measuring cups, either that or I would lose them. I've had these for about six months, and I have to say that they're easy to keep together, love how neatly they stack together, and the ball chain keeping them together is awesome too. Easy to remove the cups and then just as easy to put them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kim

customer_reviews.title: They are fine for my purposes but the handles are stubby
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have a set of back up measuring cups. They are fine for my purposes but the handles are stubby. I prefer the longer handles of my primary set.
customer_reviews.author: n1cf2

customer_reviews.title: nice, what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a complete set of measuring cups, one I owned was missing one measurement cup. Really nice, no complaints. I read some bad reviews and can't figure. The set I received is NOT sharp, NOT rusting and so far working out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter-in-law and when they arrived and I saw how well made and sturdy these were, I immediately bought some for myself. They are Great. Good-bye plastic measuring cups forever. These should last forever.
customer_reviews.author: C. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Can easily read what size measuring cup your using.
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a set of stainless steel measuring cups for a long time. These are exactely what I have been looking for. Can easily read the size of cup. I like having the individual cups for easier measuring . The glass measuring cups eventually lose the writing on them after being washed several times plus you don't worry about breaking these. Plastic cups just dont work for me either. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement of nesting measuring cups after 25 years of the old plastic ones. These are stainless steel and are very easy to use and clean. I recommend this product for the fine craftsmanship and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L Shroyer

customer_reviews.title: Must have - lovely yet sturdy daily use measuring cups!
customer_reviews.text: Rec’d these lovely measuring cups a few days ago; have used them daily. They are sturdy, heavy, easy to handle (RA hands). The measurements are in-bedded in the handles, standard n metric. They’re easy to hand wash; I haven't washed them in the dishwasher n don’t intend to (never have). Highly recommend them. Thanks Bellemain! Now if only I could find the same high quality measuring spoons, I’d be one happy home cook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great except one thing
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I disliked is that they're connected by a chain instead of a ring. I'll probably replace it with a binder ring. Other than that, they're great. They're dishwasher safe, they have all the sizes I need, and they're slightly rounded at the bottom while still being flat enough to stand up on their own, which I find makes it easier to scoop things.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent measuring cups.
customer_reviews.text: They are very heavy stainless steel and should last a lifetime. I like the shorter handles on them. It makes scooping flour and sugar from the bag or storage bin much easier than longer handles. The cup and handle are all one piece of stainless steel. There is no seam there where food particles or bacteria can get in. The sides curve into the bottom so again, there is no crevice or corner there for food to get stuck in. I absolutely love that the set includes a 2/3 and 3/4 cup sizes as well. It makes measuring ingredients much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kohout

customer_reviews.title: Almost just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups are almost perfect for our kitchen, especially with six sizes. Only downside is that the handles are just a bit short for me, but otherwise they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Lichty

product_meta.title: Bellemain Stainless Steel Measuring Cup Set, 6 Piece
product_meta.description:
Bellemain Steel Measuring Cups

 Are You Frustrated with Bland, Run of the Mill Measuring Cups that Bend or Break, Tip Over, Are Hard to Clean and Are Contaminating Your Food with BPA!?

 If you have to scrounge through drawers to find your unnested, hard to clean plastic measuring cups, and you’re tired of:

• Bent or broken handles on your cheap metal or plastic measuring cups


• Trying to keep your unbalanced measuring cups from tipping over and dumping the contents on the counter top


• Worrying about getting jungle rot from a measuring cup made from polysiloxanes (silicone) or BPA infested plastic




 We don’t blame you because…

 Now there’s a new, elegant, fun and more graceful way to accurately measure anything when you cook or bake.

 Our Stainless Steel Measuring Cups will revitalize your “joy of cooking” because they:

• Are cast in a satiny smooth, 1 piece, Stainless Steel, 18/8 gauge finish


• Nest compactly, 6 in a package for easy storage


• Have flat, stable bottoms that do not tip over


• Include the “odd” sizes that are hard to find in other sets


• Are dishwasher safe, easy to clean


• Have ml and cup sizes clearly etched in the handle


• Are small enough across the top to fit easily into containers


 Order now and Don’t Miss Out! Take advantage of our 100% Lifetime Money Back Guarantee.



 If for any reason you’re not completely satisfied, return your Stainless Steel Measuring Cups for a No Questions Asked full refnd.
feature_bullets: EXPERIENCE THE BEST-RATED MEASURING CUPS ON AMAZON: Whether its the beauty in the smooth stainless steel and 18/8 gauge finish or the utility of its flat, non-tipping bottoms and compact nesting, people have set the Bellemain Stainless Steel Measuring Cup Set’s Amazon Review section on fire with perfect 5-reviews!

COOK SAFELY WITH STEEL: You don’t want silicone or BPA-infested plastic to touch your cooking. We know that, so don’t worry: all of our measuring cups are crafted from durable, one-piece (no welds) dishwasher-safe stainless steel.

FIND THE SIZE THAT FITS: With other brands that sell stainless steel measuring cups, ¾ cups are sold as part of another set. Not us: you get everything you need the first time. Each cup also Includes ml and cup sizes clearly etched on each handle.

USE WITH EASE: With wide handles to allow even clumsy fingers to hold tight, the Bellemain measuring cup set belongs in every person’s kitchen regardless of culinary skill. De-burred edges ensure you don’t get scratched if you’re hand-washing them, too.

OUR “MADE-TO-MEASURE” GUARANTEE: If you’re anything less than amazed by any Bellemain product, you can return it no-questions-asked for a 100% refund. To see how Bellemain’s stainless steel measuring cup set’s precision and design enhances your (or a loved one’s) next culinary adventure, Click “ADD TO CART” now.
